attributes.action: Student Nurses should get paid during placement
attributes.additional_details: As a student nurse myself we are not expecting alot! But something is better then nothing!
attributes.background: Student Nurses should be paid money during placement. They do 2300 hours of placement unpaid. As well as on top having to pay for travel, parking and other circumstances.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Ensure that student nurses are paid for their placement hours
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710218
